settings.title: WINES OF TERROIR, SPIRITS FROM THE SOURCE
settings.text: Bien Élevé is an importer and online retailer based in Washington, D.C. We specialize in well- made natural wines and rare, expertly-aged single-barrel spirits.

settings.title: WINES OF TERROIR,  SPIRITS FROM THE SOURCE
settings.caption_title: Selecting a barrel of Calvados in Normandy.
settings.caption: Selecting a barrel of Calvados in Normandy.
settings.text: We select directly from the cellars of our small-scale, independent European producers to bring you delicious bottles straight from the source and at excellent value.

settings.title: WEBSHOP
settings.text:
Our producers’ wines and spirits are for purchase in our web shop as they arrive throughout the year. 

We are able to ship to most states and also offer local delivery in the Washington, D.C. area. 

We also offer the opportunity for you to join our Club and receive a quarterly release of our latest selections.  You can be a part of our Spirits Single Barrel Club, our Wine Club, or both and receive special double subscriber perks, access to exclusive bottles and discounts! As part of either Club, you’ll get access to special releases and a 15% discount on all purchases. Please click here for more information.

settings.title: PERSONALIZED Single-CaskS
settings.text:
Make your own selection of Single Cask Armagnac, Cognac or Calvados!

We have a very limited selection of single casks available for purchase from several of France’s best brandy houses including:

Cardinat, Barraillon, Pellehaut, Grosperrin, Huard, Pacory and more!

These casks have been curated from our visits to the producers cellars and have been hand-selected as extraordinary barrels which we are proud to offer. Please contact Greg at greg@drinkbien.com if you’re interested in learning more about a single barrel selection.

settings.title: TRADE
settings.text:
We self-distribute our producers' wines and spirits in the New York/New Jersey and Washington, D.C. metro regions. 

If you’re a restaurant, bar or retailer interested in working with our producers, please get in touch at kristen@drinkbien.com!

settings.title: BESPOKE WINE CURATION
settings.text:
Want wine for an event or party? Interested in organizing a group tasting? Are you looking to build a cellar or add to your collection? We’d love to help.

Please reach out to Kristen at kristen@drinkbien.com for more information!

settings.title: GREG FARON
settings.text: Greg Faron is a Washington, D.C.-based hotelier with a passion for brandy and single-barrel spirits. He side-gigs as a real estate executive.

settings.title: JON BRAND
settings.text: Jon Brand lives in Paris. A former sports journalist, he worked distributing wine to the city's top restaurants before starting Bien Élevé.

settings.title: GET IN TOUCH
settings.caption: All of our producers are small-scale family-owned businesses.

settings.title:
Join the
Bien Élevé family
settings.text: All our wine and spirits news that’s fit to print, delivered once a week. Receive our newsletter for first access to new arrivals, special offers, bottle reviews and more.
